name: Tower escape (itch)
description:
Disclaimer : this is my first game, and my first game jam !

I'm following miziziziz tutorial to be a game dev in under a year and it's my first game ever. I made it in ~2 days (I've used only about 20h because I was really busy this week)

This is a puzzle game where you make your way up into a tower by moving objects and using keys to open doors. I'm really happy to have found a game mechanic that I like, but it's more a Proof Of Concept than an actual game. There's only 3 (yes, it's very short ^^') playable levels because I had some bugs that made some levels not work at all (keys won't open doors, collision fails etc.)

It's not a good game but I'm publishing it anyway so at least I can say that I made it !
